events.name: matchNhack
events.about:
The premier mini hack meet/conference in Stockholm where developers, startups and speakers come together to share, collaborate and build on concepts that will allow them to generate viral hype with their brand/products.

Furthermore, the event provides startups and developers the chance to engage in uninterrupted interaction sessions of 15 minutes each to build synergy between them. The hackathon that follows empower this synergy further by getting the developers to work with startups. By doing this, developers can understand more about startups and increase the possibility of recruitment.

If you need additional information, check our website at www.matchNhack.com or please dont hesitate to email errol@jublia.com
